snippet.title: Cities: VR - Enhanced Edition - Announcement Trailer | PS VR2 Games
snippet.description:
Cities: VR - Enhanced Edition is coming to PS VR2! Pre-order today for a 10% discount: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP3046-PPSA10719_00-2346428674794398


Be the mayor and design neighborhoods, construct buildings, direct the flow of traffic - all while you handle economics, emergency services, and more. See your skyline rise from an expansive bird's eye view, or watch your city come alive from the streets. From cozy suburbs to massive metropolises, only your imagination is the limit. Step inside this VR adaptation of the leading city-builder, Cities: Skylines.

#psvr2
